import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import Markdown from 'react-markdown' import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import HeroImage from './../projectPage/HeroImage.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' const data = { 'heroImage':require('./../../content/projects/balancingRobot/hero-image.png'), 'video1':'videos/1.mp4' } const a = { 'title':'Rhythm: Signal Processing', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/balancingRobot/1.png'), 'text':'By measuring the energy of the sound signal, the beat of the song can be determined. On the beat, the energy of the sound peaks. The LED flash was then used to make sure that the program is detecting the beat correctly.' } function BalancingRobot(props) { return(

{this.state.title}

{this.state.text}

) } export default BalancingRobot;
